mapper.select: select * from sell order by sell_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into sell values(seq_product_no.nextval, #{sellTitle}, #{sellWriter}, default, #{sellContent}, default, #{sellPrice}, default, default, default, default)
mapper.update: update sell set sell_title = #{sellTitle}, sell_content = #{sellContent}, sell_state = #{sellState}, sell_price = #{sellPrice}, sell_title = #{sellTitle} where sell_no = #{sellNo}
